rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Rangers.png|180px|right|thumb|The Rangers club crest]]
 
This is a '''list of [[Rangers F.C.|Rangers Football Club]]'s managers''' and all those who have held the position of [[coach (sport)|manager]] of the first team of Rangers, in its various gises, since their foundation in 1873. Each manager's entry includes his dates of tenure and the club's overall competitive record (in terms of first team matches won, drawn and lost), honours won and significant achievements while under his care. [[Caretaker manager]]s are included, where known, as well as those who have been in permanent charge. As of the start of the [[Rangers F.C. season 2009-10|2009–10]] season, Rangers have had twelve full-time managers and three caretakers.
This is a '''list of [[Rangers F.C.|Rangers Football Club]]'s managers''' and all those who have held the position of [[coach (sport)|manager]] of the first team of Rangers, in its various gises, since their foundation in 1873. Each manager's entry includes his dates of tenure and the club's overall competitive record (in terms of first team matches won, drawn and lost), honours won and significant achievements while under his care. [[Caretaker manager]]s are included, where known, as well as those who have been in permanent charge. As of the start of the [[Rangers F.C. season 2009-10|2009–10]] season, Rangers have had twelve full-time managers and three caretakers.
